blogPost.excerpt: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
blogPost.body: Beeper is fast. A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
blogPost.title: Beeper - All of your chats in one app
blogPost.author: Charlie Irish

localize.description: 哔哩哔哩速度快。一个应用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13个网络上聊天。你可以搜索、静音或存档信息。有了统一的收件箱，你再也不会错过任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天记录都在一个应用程序中

localize.description: 嗶哩嗶哩速度快。一個應用就可以在iMessage、WhatsApp和其他13個網絡上聊天。你可以搜索、靜音或存檔信息。有了統一的收件箱，你再也不會錯過任何信息。
localize.tagline: 你的所有聊天記錄都在一個應用程序中

previous.excerpt: Generate HTML code optimal for social media, SEO, mobile for your single-page app. This uses web standards from Open Graph (Facebook) and Twitter to provide optimal results. Also generates social media posts.
previous.title: Meta Tag Generator - Generate HTML code optimal for SEO, social media, & mobile.

localize.description: 为您的单页应用生成适合社交媒体、SEO、移动端的HTML代码。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的网络标准，提供最佳效果。还可以生成社交媒体帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最适合SEO、社交媒体和手机的HTML代码。

localize.description: 爲您的單頁應用生成適合社交媒體、SEO、移動端的HTML代碼。使用Open Graph (Facebook)和Twitter的網絡標準，提供最佳效果。還可以生成社交媒體帖子。
localize.tagline: 生成最適合SEO、社交媒體和手機的HTML代碼。

next.excerpt: Think “Cards Against Humanity” meets Microsoft Paint. Now add an AI as the judge. Paint.wtf challenges you to draw your best on zany prompts and then be scored by an AI. See if you can rank atop the global leaderboard. A new prompt is released every 2 hours!
next.title: paint.wtf - A drawing game where an AI is the judge

localize.description: 想想 "纸牌反人类 "与微软绘画的结合。现在添加一个AI作为裁判。Paint.wtf 挑战你在滑稽的提示上画出你最好的作品，然后由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小时发布一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一个人工智能作为裁判的绘画游戏

localize.description: 想想 "紙牌反人類 "與微軟繪畫的結合。現在添加一個AI作爲裁判。Paint.wtf 挑戰你在滑稽的提示上畫出你最好的作品，然後由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小時發佈一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一個人工智能作爲裁判的繪畫遊戲
